page.title: 10Education <continued>/Clubs
page.content:
school secretary is Mrs. O. Barclay and the school caretaker is Mrs.P.Jennings. The school has a sports day and a small schools area sports day each once a year also swimming galas. The boys play football and cricket matches against other local schools.
{Clubs } The old Parish Hall, were most of the clubs are held, used to be an old galvanized shed on the ground were Mr. John Ashley now has his bungalow. Captain R.C.D. Owen Plas Yn Grove gave the playing fields to the village so a new Parish Hall was built for Christmas 1960 The basic structure of the Village Hall was an ex-army building with a new brick Wark Shell built around it.
